summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Central Freeway Park and authorizing as between The City of Seattle and the State of Washington an addendum to the tripartite agreement executed by the State of Washington, The City of Seattle and Richard C. Hedreen (which agreement was authorized by Ordinance 98854, is contained in C.F. 267721, and is identified by the State as GC2787) conditionally providing for construction by the State at State expense of certain additional park appurtenances and landscaping features.
